messages.content:
You are tasked with adding English translations to a set of stakeholder quotes. For each quote:
- If the quote is in English, add "N.A." as the translation
- If the quote is in any other language, provide an accurate English translation

Input format is a markdown table with stakeholder names and quotes.
Output should be a markdown table with three columns: name, original quote, and translation.

IMPORTANT RULES:
- Never translate English quotes to English - use "N.A." instead.
- Only and always translate non-English quotes.
- If the original quote, in the third column of the md table is not in english, translate it and add the translation in the 4th column, as described below, but that is only when the quote is not in English.
- Keep original quotes exactly as they are.
- Maintain the markdown table format, without including any horizontal divider lines

Example input:
| Pierre Dupont | Consumer | "Cette décision est importante." |
| John Smith | Fortescue's corporate lawyer | "We need to review this carefully." |

Example output:
| Pierre Dupont | Consumer | "Cette décision est importante." | "This decision is important." |
| John Smith | Fortescue's corporate lawyer | "We need to review this carefully." | N.A. |

Example input:
| [Person Name 1] | Person Role 1 | [Original Quote in another language (e.g. Dutch, French, German, Spanish,eyc..)] |
| [person Name 2] | Person Role 2 | [Original Quote in English] |

Example output:
| [person Name 1] | Person Role 1 | [Original Quote in another language (e.g. Dutch, French, German, Spanish,etc..)] | [Translated Quote] |
| [person Name 2] | Person Role 2 | [Original Quote in English] | N.A. |

If the input is "None", return "None". if the original quote is not in English, make sure it is translated. Add "N.A" if the quote is already in English.

Input quotes:
| Andrew Forrest | Fortescue's Executive Chairman | "Fortescue would produce 200 million tonnes of green iron ore annually through its efforts to achieve zero emissions." |
| Roger Cook | WA Premier | "Even WA premier Roger Cook has questioned if Fortescue went too far." |
| Michael Masterman | Former Fortescue Chief Scientist | "Element Zero says its technology was developed independently and is very different from anything Fortescue has done." |
| Bart Kolodziejczyk | Former Fortescue Chief Scientist | "Element Zero says its technology was developed independently and is very different from anything Fortescue has done." |
| Bjorn Winther-Jensen | Former Fortescue Employee | "Element Zero says its technology was developed independently and is very different from anything Fortescue has done." |
| Fiona Hick | Former Chief Executive of Fortescue's Iron Ore Division | "This week, Fiona Hick joined the board of gold and copper producer Evolution Mining in her first major move since leaving Fortescue after just six months as chief executive of its iron ore division." |

| Andrew Forrest | Fortescue's Executive Chairman | "Fortescue would produce 200 million tonnes of green iron ore annually through its efforts to achieve zero emissions." | N.A. |
| Roger Cook | WA Premier | "Even WA premier Roger Cook has questioned if Fortescue went too far." | N.A. |
| Michael Masterman | Former Fortescue Chief Scientist | "Element Zero says its technology was developed independently and is very different from anything Fortescue has done." | N.A. |
| Bart Kolodziejczyk | Former Fortescue Chief Scientist | "Element Zero says its technology was developed independently and is very different from anything Fortescue has done." | N.A. |
| Bjorn Winther-Jensen | Former Fortescue Employee | "Element Zero says its technology was developed independently and is very different from anything Fortescue has done." | N.A. |
| Fiona Hick | Former Chief Executive of Fortescue's Iron Ore Division | "This week, Fiona Hick joined the board of gold and copper producer Evolution Mining in her first major move since leaving Fortescue after just six months as chief executive of its iron ore division." | N.A. |
